summary: Craft your own dwarven robot army and Conquer Tamriel!
descriptionHtml:
[size=3][center][/center][center] This mod Is no longer supported.
It is now merged with my other mod Aetherial Palace.
[youtube]E1cJYIrDq-4[/youtube][/center]


This mod will allow you to create your own Dwarven automatons that will fight for you[/size]
[size=3]and also allow you to carry them in a container.[/size]

[size=3]To use this mod you'll need[/size]

[size=3]the Dwarven Smithing perk [/size]
[size=3]and the new perk Dwarven Animunculi Crafting in the smithing tree[/size]

[size=3]To use the automatons[/size]
[size=3] when you craft the container[/size]
[size=3]drop the container and your robot will spawn [/size]

[size=3]To contain them activate your automaton and a pop up box will appear and ask if you want to store them.[/size]
[size=3]selcet it and your automaton will go back into its container and will be ready to use again when you need it[/size]



[size=3]you are able to craft[/size]


[center][size=2]-----------------------------
[/size][size=5]Regular[/size]
-----------------------------
[size=3]Dwarven Spider[/size]
[size=3]Dwarven Ballista[/size]
[size=3]Dwarven Sphere[/size]
[size=3]Dwarven Steam Centurion[/size]
-----------------------------------------------------------------
[size=5]Dwarven Creature types
[/size]------------------------------------------------------------------
[size=3]Dwarven Fire Droid (dwarven style flame atronach)
Dwarven Frost Miner (dwarven style frost atronach)
Dwarven Storm Sweeper (dwarven style strom atronach)
Dwarven Smasher (Dwarven Style Troll.)
Dwarven Gargoyle Sentinal (Dwarven Style Gargoyle....Duh..)
Dwarven Punisher (Dwarven Style Werewolf)
Dwarven Empress (Dwarven Style Wisp)
Dwarven EYEBOT (Dwarven Style ice wriath.)
Dwaven Gynoid (Dwarven female human spellblade)
Dwarven Commander (Dwarven human spellblade)
Dwarven Trooper (Dwarven human Melee type)
Dwarven Old Worker (Dwarven Style Falmer)
Dwarven Worker (Dwarven Style Draugr)
Dwarven Charger (Dwarven style Mounted Riekling)
Dwarven Big Dog (Dwarven style Horse)
Dwarven Worm (Dwarven Style Chaurus)
Dwarven Ripper (Dwarven Style Spriggan)[/size]
-----------------------------------------------------------------------
[size=5]Dwarven Legendary Creatures[/size]
[size=2]------------------------------------------------------------------------
[/size][size=3]Dwarven Tyrant
(Dwarven Style Dragon, NOTE they will hover in place and not follow you, but they will FIGHT FOR YOU.
after combat they will go to your Current position

Dwarven Fire Centurion Titan (Dwarven Forge Master Regular)
Dwarven Frost Centurion Titan (Dwarven Forge Master Frost varient)
Dwarven Storm Centurion Titan (Dwarven Forge Master Storm Varient)
Dwarven Aetherium Centurion Titan (Dwarven Forge Master Aetherium varient)

Dwarven Keeper (Dwarven Style Giant, with optional weapons like
Mace
Axe
Sword
Warhammer[/size]

---------------------------------------------------------
[size=5]Explosive automatons
[/size]---------------------------------------------------------
Dwarven Eggmen (Dwarven style chicken that explode on death.
NOTE the Eggmen bodies will disapear AFTER exploding)
[size=3]Dwarven Page (dwarven style riekling that come with EXPLOSIVE FIRE, FROST and SHOCK SPEARS!  )[/size]

-------------
[size=5]Spells
[/size]-------------
[size=3]Fortify Melee and Range Combat[/size]
[size=3]Fortify Destruction Automaton Magic[/size]
[size=3]Grand Repair Dwarven Centurions[/size]
[size=3]Grand Repair Concentration Dwarven Centurions[/size]

----------------------
[size=5]UTILITIES
[/size]---------------------
[size=3]Dwarven BOMBS (drop them from your inventory and they will explode where your standing, with a 3-5 second delay)
Giant Dwarven Spear Arrows (Explosive Dwarven Arrows That Deal Massive Damage)
[/size][/center][size=3]------------------------------------------[/size][b][center]UPDATING[/center][/b][center]-------------------------------------------[/center]

[u][b][size=4][center]for new users who haven't installed this mod before,
you will be fine, install it as normal.[/center][/size][/b][/u][size=3][center]before updating to 1.9.0 this will require you to save your game 

uninstall the mod 

Deactivate and store all containers in a box or sell them.

Load up [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/52363/?]Save Game Script Cleaner[/url]

Clean you save by selecting  [u][b]Delete all #[/b] and [b]Fix script instances[/b] [/u]

Save as (what ever you name it)

Load up your newly cleaned save in skyrim 

save again

install the mod

have fun[/center][/size]


[center][size=5]Required files
[/size]DLCs
Dawnguard 
Hearthfire
Dragonborn

[size=4]Mods Required
[/size][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/71214/?]Unofficial Skyrim Legendary Patch[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/3863/?]Sky UI[/url]

[size=5]Patches [/size]
[size=3]Ordinator 
Requiem
Perkus Maximus
[/size]
[size=5]Recommed Mods[/size]

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/63949/?]Granite Markarth and Dwemer Ruins[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/68650/?]Dwemer Automaton HD[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/30062/?]Dwemer Beards
[/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/34326/?]Dwemer Garb
[/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/56037/?]Dwemertech - Magic of the dwarves[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/52491/?]Deep Elf Race[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/33395/?]SkyTweak
[/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/36328/?]Grimys Utilities[/url] 


[size=4]TRANSLATION[/size]

Portuguese Translation by Komodoro
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/72580/?]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/72580/?
[/url][/center]

[center][size=5]ASSETS[/size]
if you want to use the assets of this mod 
you need to visit T3ndo for permisions

http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/59849/?

you need to visit Vicn for permisions
http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/65134/?[list]
[/list][/center][list]
[size=3]-----------------------------------[/size][size=5]File credits[/size][size=3]-----------------------------------
[/size]I would like to thank T3ndo for allowing modders to use his perkus maximus resources, without it none of this would be possible.[size=3]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/59849/?[/size][size=3]I would also like to thank Vicn for modders to use there Vicn Creature Pack resource,[/size][size=3]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/65134/?[/size][size=3]I would also like to thank[/size][size=3]ECE Team[/size][size=3]dimon99[/size][size=3]Radioragae[/size][size=3]REN[/size][size=3]Peggy[/size][size=3]NewSea
[/size][size=3]SKS[/size][/list]
[list]
I would also like to thank EnaiSiaion for the Move Actor to target script.[/list]


[center][size=5]ISSUES/BALANCING[/size][/center]
A.I to fix
add stats to the mcm menu + Extra Stuff

[center][size=5]FUTURE UPDATES[/size][/center]
I will be adding new Automatons to this mod and add new abilitys to both the current and new automatons
author: TheBlackKnight3000

files.name: Dwarven Automaton Crafting Perkus Maximus Patch
files.fileName: Dwarven Automaton Crafting Perkus Maximus Patch-71777-1-4.rar
files.changelogHtml:
Fixed Dwarven Sweeper, Droid and Miner's bodies going invisible
REBALANCED Everything (item weight, Crafting requirements, Spells cost and effectiveness, Automaton Leveling and stats.)
NEW Added Dwarven Tyrant Dragon, Eyebot Icewraith, Exploding Dwarven Chickens,
NEW perk tree
NEW Craftable Bombs

files.name: Dwarven Automaton Crafting Requiem Patch
files.changelogHtml:
Fixed Dwarven Sweeper, Droid and Miner's bodies going invisible
REBALANCED Everything (item weight, Crafting requirements, Spells cost and effectiveness, Automaton Leveling and stats.)
NEW Added Dwarven Tyrant Dragon, Eyebot Icewraith, Exploding Dwarven Chickens,
NEW perk tree
NEW Craftable Bombs

files.name: Dwarven Automaton Crafting Ordinator Patch
files.changelogHtml:
Fixed the Dwarven charger recipie to use use a couple of dwarven ingots and a Dynamo Core
NEW Added a empty container, (it will be used for future updates)

files.name: Dwemer Automaton (Crafting Main File)
files.changelogHtml: Huge AI Fixes (Its not the 100% Fixed AI but Robot Npc's types can go through load doors and fast travel, some clones might get left behind so do keep it to only a few at a time for now.)
